name: Fruit Splash - Fruit Family
description:
Connect colorful fruits to solve over 100 levels in this compelling puzzle adventure. Why don't you try and make a big splash with your friends?

---------------------------

FEATURES:

* Easy to learn, hard to master
* Colorful and vivid graphics
* No annoying time limits - Play at your own pace
* Over 100 levels with challenging obstacles - each one is unique and full of fun and amazing challenges
* 6 unique game mode
* Leaderboards to complete against your friends via Facebook
* Master the power of Super Fruits
* Seamless synchronization with Facebook
* Top-notch performance! Animated fruits and effects
* Free update with more levels

---------------------------

Fruit Splash is completely free to play but some in-game items such as extra moves or lives will require payment or Facebook connection. To delete this feature, on your device go to Setting Menu->General->Restrictions option. You can then simply turn off In-App Purchases under "Allowed Content".

We're sure that you're going to love Fruit Splash! Please be sure to rate the game below. Your feedback will help us make the games you love even better.
